mapper.select: SELECT m.id,m.parent_id,m.name,m.type,m.create_time,m.modified_time,m.creator,m.status, u.actual_name as creator_name, CASE WHEN m.creator=#{userId} THEN #{fullAction} ELSE mp.action END AS `action` FROM matter m left JOIN matter_permissions mp ON m.id = mp.matter_id LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON mp.role_id = ur.role_id AND ur.user_id = #{userId} AND mp.role_type = 0 LEFT JOIN `user` u on u.id=m.creator WHERE -- user权限 ((mp.role_id = #{userId} AND mp.role_type = 1 ) -- role权限 OR (mp.role_type = 0 AND ur.user_id = #{userId} ) -- creator权限 OR m.creator=#{userId}) and m.id=#{matterId} group by id

select * from( SELECT m.id,m.parent_id,m.name,m.type,m.create_time,m.modified_time,m.creator,m.status, u.actual_name as creator_name, CASE WHEN m.creator=#{userId} THEN #{fullAction} ELSE mp.action END AS `action` FROM matter m left JOIN matter_permissions mp ON m.id = mp.matter_id LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON mp.role_id = ur.role_id AND ur.user_id = #{userId} AND mp.role_type = 0 LEFT JOIN `user` u on u.id=m.creator WHERE -- user权限 ((mp.role_id = #{userId} AND mp.role_type = 1 ) -- role权限 OR (mp.role_type = 0 AND ur.user_id = #{userId} ) -- creator权限 OR m.creator=#{userId}) and m.parent_id=#{matterId} ) a where a.action>0 group by id
